title: Kris Kringle's Filled Sugar Cookies
directions: Cream shortening and sugar. Add eggs, beating, one at a time.
Add sour cream and vanilla, stir. Combine soda, baking powder, flour and salt.
Add to sour cream mixture. Mix until it no longer sticks to your hand and can be formed into a ball, adding flour as needed.
Roll out on a floured surface to approximately 1/8 inch thick. Cut with a round cookie cutter.
Make a small indentation in the center of one cookie, place a scant teaspoon of jam or preserves in the center, then top with another cookie, sealing the edges.
Place on a cookie sheet in a preheated 350 oven for 15 - 18 minutes.
For variety, may add nuts instead of making a double cookie. (3/4 cup chopped nuts).
